00033         public function log(&$gp,$settings) {
00034 
00035                 //set params
00036                 $table = "tx_mailformplusplus_log";
00037 
00038                 $fields['ip'] = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('REMOTE_ADDR');
00039                 if(isset($settings['disableIPlog']) && intval($settings['disableIPlog']) == 1) {
00040                         $fields['ip'] = NULL;
00041                 }
00042                 $fields['tstamp'] = time();
00043                 $fields['crdate'] = time();
00044                 $fields['pid'] = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id;
00045                 $keys = array_keys($gp);
00046                 ksort($gp);
00047                 sort($keys);
00048                 $serialized = serialize($gp);
00049                 $hash = hash("md5",serialize($keys));
00050                 $fields['params'] = $serialized;
00051                 $fields['key_hash'] = $hash;
00052 
00053                 #$fields = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->fullQuoteArray($fields,$table);
00054 
00055                 //query the database
00056                 $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_INSERTquery($table,$fields);
00057                 if(!$settings['nodebug']) {
00058                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('logging',$table,implode(",",$fields));
00059                         if(strlen($GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_error()) > 0) {
00060                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage('error',$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_error());
00061                         }
00062                                 
00063                 }
00064 
00065         }
00066 
00067 }
